name: controlLightBySwitchbot
description: Control light given command by Switchbot.

commandType.description: The Command target to control light. e.g. if target is 'living room' then commandType='main', else if target is 'next to the living room' then commandType='next', else commandType='other'

commandTurning.description: The Command to send power On/Off. e.g. 'turnOn', 'turnOff'
